name: resemble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 to look like or be like someone or something: You resemble your mother very closely. After the earthquake, the city resembled a battlefield.
More examplesFewer examplesThe overlapping slates of the roofs in the mountain village resembled fish scales.His latest sculpture resembles an enormous seashell.That actor really resembles my brother-in-law.The finished model should resemble the one in the picture.The twins resembled each other more strongly when they were young.
